programme.title: Sad Vacation: The Last Days Of Sid And Nancy
programme.desc: Sad Vacation is a new documentary on the lives and deaths of Sid Vicious and Nancy Spungen.

programme.title: SPIN Presents: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Movies That Rock!

programme.title: Fuzztones - Live At Rockpalast
programme.desc: Great garage rock revival spectacle with The Fuzztones all-time favorites recorded live at German's Rockpalast: Cheeky, snotty, dirty, full of energy.

programme.title: Culture Club - Live At Wembley
programme.desc: Culture Club performing their biggest hits like you've never seen them before!

programme.title: a-ha: The Movie
programme.desc: Take on Me made them global superstars. and a-ha still sells out arenas worldwide - but can they mend the broken friendships?

programme.title: B52s - Live At The US Festival
programme.desc: Watch the B-52's absolutely delight the crowd with Rock Lobster, Planet Claire, Private Idaho and more of their early classics. Live from the US Festival 1982

programme.title: SPIN COVER STORY yungblud: "walk with me"
programme.desc: If Yungblud led a cult, many would join - even those who fancy themselves hard to persuade. He has an orbit, an aura, an affability that is borderline intoxicating. You can experience it for yourself during our walk with Yungblud through the Sunset Strip, from the Viper Room to the Rainbow Bar and Grill – watch Yungblud share some incredible stories and a Dr Pepper

programme.title: MOD SUN Interview: Walk With Me | SPIN Cover Story
programme.desc: No doubt MOD’s lived many lives since Happy To Be Here was first published in 2015, stating that he feels fortunate to have accomplished so much of what he’d set out to do. His main goal is to keep evolving.

programme.title: Get Thrashed Around The World
programme.desc: Stellar metal bands came out of Germany, UK, France, Brazil, Canada, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Canada, and more as part of the Thrash Metal movement. Members of bands like Slayer, Metallica, Slipknot, and Exodus reminisce about their favorite bands and the best musicians of the era. A virtual encyclopedia of metal bands that toured the world, but that fans may have forgotten or can now discover.

programme.title: SPIN Presents: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: From Amadeus the worlds first rockstar to The Beatles and Elvis, Hollywood has always remembered "When Rock Was Young"

programme.title: LoudQUIETloud: A Film About the Pixies
programme.desc: loudQUIETloud follows the rehearsals and the warm-up shows for the full-fledged, sold-out Pixies reunion tour. It also catalogs, in the cinema-verite style of the Rolling Stones' Gimme Shelter, the less glamorous side of the touring band lifestyle, getting as close to this enigmatic act as anyone is ever likely to get. The Pixies have a once-in-a-lifetime chance at rock n roll redemption.

programme.title: SPIN Presents: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: In the 1970's Hollywood began to release a whole new type of musical film. Bob Fosse, Hippies, and Jesus were the new stars in this adventurous period in cinema.

programme.title: Stiv: No Compromise No Regrets
programme.desc: Almost 30 years after Stiv's mysterious death in Paris, the Dead Boys have become the stuff of (Punk) legends but unsurprisingly, the story remains largely untold. How did this native from Girard, Ohio end up living the life of Riley in Paris, France' Was Stiv really hit by a car (or a taxi...) on that fateful day' Who was the real Stiv Bators' These are a few of the questions answered in STIV.

programme.title: SPIN x Fire: Free Speech + Other Dirty Words
programme.desc: Hear Etheridge discuss her message and mission in Free Speech + Other Dirty Words, presented by SPIN and the FIRE, and hosted by Ryan Downey.
